R51.nl_constraint: Rock analysis from waypoint1 should be performed first

children.nl_constraint: Before soil data from waypoint6 is communicated, rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated

<documents>
<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

Before soil data from waypoint0 is communicated, rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated

The user wants me to translate a natural language constraint into PDDL3.0. Let me analyze the constraint:

"Before soil data from waypoint0 is communicated, rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated"

This is a temporal constraint that specifies an ordering relationship between two events:
1. Rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated
2. Soil data from waypoint0 can be communicated (but only after the first event)

In PDDL3.0, this type of constraint can be expressed using temporal logic operators. The constraint is saying that whenever soil data from waypoint0 is communicated, it must be the case that rock data from waypoint1 has already been communicated.

Looking at the domain, I can see the relevant predicates:
- (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint) - indicates that soil data from waypoint ?w has been communicated
- (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint) - indicates that rock data from waypoint ?w has been communicated

The constraint can be expressed as an implication: if soil data from waypoint0 is communicated, then rock data from waypoint1 must have been communicated before.

In PDDL3.0, this can be written using the "always" temporal operator and implication. The constraint should be:

always (communicated_soil_data waypoint0 -> communicated_rock_data waypoint1)

This means: at all times, if soil data from waypoint0 is communicated, then rock data from waypoint1 must also be communicated.

Wait, let me think about this more carefully. The constraint is "Before soil data from waypoint0 is communicated, rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated". This is a precedence constraint.

In PDDL3.0, this can be expressed as:
- At any time when soil data from waypoint0 becomes communicated, rock data from waypoint1 must already be communicated


This can be written as:
always (communicated_soil_data waypoint0 -> communicated_rock_data waypoint1)

I'll verify the temporal logic ensures the precise ordering requirement. The PDDL3.0 formulation guarantees rock data communication must precede soil data communication at waypoint0, maintaining the original constraint's intent.

<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)

;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)

              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)

              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata

Let me analyze this constraint step by step:

The constraint is: "Before rock data from waypoint3 is communicated, rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated"

This is a temporal constraint that establishes an ordering between two events:
1. Rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated 
2. Rock data from waypoint3 must be communicated

The constraint says that event 1 must happen BEFORE event 2.

Looking at the PDDL domain and problem, I can see that there are predicates:
- (communicated_rock_data waypoint1)  
- (communicated_rock_data waypoint3)

In PDDL3.0, to express temporal constraints like "X must happen before Y", we typically use implication with temporal operators.

The constraint can be expressed as: "If rock data from waypoint3 is communicated, then rock data from waypoint1 must have been communicated (at some point before)."

In PDDL3.0, this would be written as:
```
(always (imply (communicated_rock_data waypoint3) (communicated_rock_data waypoint1)))
```

This says that at all times, if rock data from waypoint3 has been communicated, then rock data from waypoint1 must also have been communicated.

Actually, let me think about this more carefully. The constraint "Before rock data from waypoint3 is communicated, rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated" means that waypoint1's rock data should be communicated first.

This is indeed captured by:
```
(always (imply (communicated_rock_data waypoint3) (communicated_rock_data waypoint1)))
```

This constraint ensures that whenever waypoint3's rock data is communicated, waypoint1's rock data must already be communicated. This effectively enforces the ordering requirement.

<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)

              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)

              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)

              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)

              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)

              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)

Let me analyze this constraint:

"Before image data for objective3 in lowres mode is communicated, rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated"

This is a temporal constraint that says that `communicated_rock_data waypoint1` must happen before `communicated_image_data objective3 lowres`.

In PDDL3.0, I need to express this as a state-based constraint. The constraint is saying that we cannot have `communicated_image_data objective3 lowres` be true unless `communicated_rock_data waypoint1` is already true.

This can be expressed as an implication: if `communicated_image_data objective3 lowres` is true, then `communicated_rock_data waypoint1` must also be true.

In PDDL3.0, this would be:
```
(always (imply (communicated_image_data objective3 lowres) (communicated_rock_data waypoint1)))
```

This constraint ensures that whenever the image data for objective3 in lowres mode is communicated, the rock data from waypoint1 has already been communicated.

- The constraint says "before image data for objective3 in lowres mode is communicated, rock data from waypoint1 must be communicated"
- This means that at any point in time, if we have communicated the image data, we must have already communicated the rock data
- The `always` temporal operator ensures this holds throughout the entire execution
- The `imply` operator captures the "if...then" relationship

Yes, this looks correct.

;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>
